name: Liches'Switches
description:
We tried to make an online game...

we fucked up 

We wanted to make a online combat game where players have no means of direct interaction, they must use the environment to eject opponents off the field, many traps are then present in play for this purpose.

Making the game online unfortunately turned out to be more complex than expected and a lot of time was wasted on fixing synchronization bugs, so we couldn't submit the game as we had imagined. 

Any way enjoy this piece of online game !
